117 const int IMG_BUFFER_SIZE = 10 * 1024 * 1024;
119 #define CAMERA_NUMBER 0

122 #define MMAL_CAMERA_PREVIEW_PORT 0

131 #define VIDEO_OUTPUT_BUFFERS_NUM 3

171 typedef struct {
172  unsigned char *buffer[2];
173  RASPIVID_STATE
174  *pstate;
175  int abort;
176  int frame;
178  int id;

188 static void get_status(RASPIVID_STATE *state) {
189  int temp;
190  std::string str;
191  bool temp_bool;
192  if (!state) {
193  vcos_assert(0);
194  return;
195  }
196 
197  // Default everything to zero
198  memset(state, 0, sizeof(RASPIVID_STATE));
199 
200  if (ros::param::get("~width", temp)) {
201  state->width = temp;
202  } else {
203  state->width = 640;
204  ros::param::set("~width", 640);
205  }
206 
207  if (ros::param::get("~height", temp)) {
208  state->height = temp;
209  } else {
210  state->height = 480;
211  ros::param::set("~height", 480);
212  }
213 
214  if (ros::param::get("~quality", temp)) {
215  if (temp > 0 && temp <= 100)
216  state->quality = temp;
217  else
218  state->quality = 80;
219  } else {
220  state->quality = 80;
221  ros::param::set("~quality", 80);
222  }
223 
224  if (ros::param::get("~framerate", temp)) {
225  if (temp > 0 && temp <= 90)
226  state->framerate = temp;
227  else
228  state->framerate = 30;
229  } else {
230  state->framerate = 30;
231  ros::param::set("~framerate", 30);
232  }
233 
234  if (ros::param::get("~tf_prefix", str)) {
235  tf_prefix = str;
236  } else {
237  tf_prefix = "";
238  ros::param::set("~tf_prefix", "");
239  }
240 
241  if (ros::param::get("~camera_frame_id", str)) {
242  camera_frame_id = str;
243  } else {
244  camera_frame_id = "";
245  ros::param::set("~camera_frame_id", "");
246  }
247 
248  state->isInit = 0;
249 
250  // Setup preview window defaults
251  // raspipreview_set_defaults(&state->preview_parameters);
252 
253  // Set up the camera_parameters to default
254  raspicamcontrol_set_defaults(&state->camera_parameters);
255 
256  if (ros::param::get("~hFlip", temp_bool)) {
257  state->camera_parameters.hflip = temp_bool;
258  } else {
259  state->camera_parameters.hflip = 0;
260  ros::param::set("~hFlip", 0);
261  }
262 
263  if (ros::param::get("~vFlip", temp_bool)) {
264  state->camera_parameters.vflip = temp_bool;
265  } else {
266  state->camera_parameters.vflip = 0;
267  ros::param::set("~vFlip", 0);
268  }
269 
270  if (ros::param::get("~shutter_speed", temp)) {
271  state->camera_parameters.shutter_speed = temp;
272  } else {
273  state->camera_parameters.shutter_speed = 0;
274  ros::param::set("~shutter_speed", 0);
275  }
276 }
277 
286 static void encoder_buffer_callback(MMAL_PORT_T *port,
287  MMAL_BUFFER_HEADER_T *buffer) {
288  MMAL_BUFFER_HEADER_T *new_buffer;
289  int complete = 0;
290 
291  // We pass our file handle and other stuff in via the userdata field.
292 
293  PORT_USERDATA *pData = (PORT_USERDATA *)port->userdata;
294  if (pData && pData->pstate->isInit) {
295  int bytes_written = buffer->length;
296  if (buffer->length) {
297  if (pData->id != INT_MAX) {
298  if (pData->id + buffer->length > IMG_BUFFER_SIZE) {
299  ROS_ERROR(
300  "pData->id (%d) + buffer->length (%d) > "
301  "IMG_BUFFER_SIZE (%d), skipping the frame",
302  pData->id, buffer->length, IMG_BUFFER_SIZE);
303  pData->id = INT_MAX; // mark this frame corrupted
304  } else {
305  mmal_buffer_header_mem_lock(buffer);
306  memcpy(&(pData->buffer[pData->frame & 1][pData->id]),
307  buffer->data, buffer->length);
308  pData->id += bytes_written;
309  mmal_buffer_header_mem_unlock(buffer);
310  }
311  }
312  }
313 
314  if (bytes_written != buffer->length) {
315  vcos_log_error("Failed to write buffer data (%d from %d)- aborting",
316  bytes_written, buffer->length);
317  ROS_ERROR("Failed to write buffer data (%d from %d)- aborting",
318  bytes_written, buffer->length);
319  pData->abort = 1;
320  }
321  if (buffer->flags & (MMAL_BUFFER_HEADER_FLAG_FRAME_END |
322  MMAL_BUFFER_HEADER_FLAG_TRANSMISSION_FAILED))
323  complete = 1;
324 
325  if (complete) {
326  if (pData->id != INT_MAX) {
327  // ROS_INFO("Frame size %d", pData->id);
328  if (skip_frames > 0 && frames_skipped < skip_frames) {
329  frames_skipped++;
330  } else {
331  frames_skipped = 0;
332  sensor_msgs::CompressedImage msg;
333  msg.header.seq = pData->frame;
334  msg.header.frame_id = camera_frame_id;
335  msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
336  msg.format = "jpg";
337  msg.data.insert(
338  msg.data.end(), pData->buffer[pData->frame & 1],
339  &(pData->buffer[pData->frame & 1][pData->id]));
340  image_pub.publish(msg);
341  c_info.header.seq = pData->frame;
342  c_info.header.stamp = msg.header.stamp;
343  c_info.header.frame_id = msg.header.frame_id;
344  camera_info_pub.publish(c_info);
345  pData->frame++;
346  }
347  }
348  pData->id = 0;
349  }
350  }
351 
352  // release buffer back to the pool
353  mmal_buffer_header_release(buffer);
354 
355  // and send one back to the port (if still open)
356  if (port->is_enabled) {
357  MMAL_STATUS_T status;
358 
359  new_buffer = mmal_queue_get(pData->pstate->encoder_pool->queue);
360 
361  if (new_buffer) status = mmal_port_send_buffer(port, new_buffer);
362 
363  if (!new_buffer || status != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
364  vcos_log_error("Unable to return a buffer to the encoder port");
365  ROS_ERROR("Unable to return a buffer to the encoder port");
366  }
367  }
368 }
369 
378 static MMAL_COMPONENT_T *create_camera_component(RASPIVID_STATE *state) {
379  MMAL_COMPONENT_T *camera = 0;
380  MMAL_ES_FORMAT_T *format;
381  MMAL_PORT_T *preview_port = NULL, *video_port = NULL, *still_port = NULL;
382  MMAL_STATUS_T status;
383 
384  /* Create the component */
385  status = mmal_component_create(MMAL_COMPONENT_DEFAULT_CAMERA, &camera);
386 
387  if (status != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
388  vcos_log_error("Failed to create camera component");
389  ROS_ERROR("Failed to create camera component");
390  goto error;
391  }
392 
393  if (!camera->output_num) {
394  vcos_log_error("Camera doesn't have output ports");
395  ROS_ERROR("Camera doesn't have output ports");
396  goto error;
397  }
398 
399  video_port = camera->output[MMAL_CAMERA_VIDEO_PORT];
400  still_port = camera->output[MMAL_CAMERA_CAPTURE_PORT];
401 
402  // set up the camera configuration
403  {
404  MMAL_PARAMETER_CAMERA_CONFIG_T cam_config;
405  cam_config.hdr.id = MMAL_PARAMETER_CAMERA_CONFIG;
406  cam_config.hdr.size = sizeof(cam_config);
407  cam_config.max_stills_w = state->width;
408  cam_config.max_stills_h = state->height;
409  cam_config.stills_yuv422 = 0;
410  cam_config.one_shot_stills = 0;
411  cam_config.max_preview_video_w = state->width;
412  cam_config.max_preview_video_h = state->height;
413  cam_config.num_preview_video_frames = 3;
414  cam_config.stills_capture_circular_buffer_height = 0;
415  cam_config.fast_preview_resume = 0;
416  cam_config.use_stc_timestamp = MMAL_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_MODE_RESET_STC;
417 
418  mmal_port_parameter_set(camera->control, &cam_config.hdr);
419  }
420 
421  // Now set up the port formats
422 
423  // Set the encode format on the video port
424 
425  format = video_port->format;
426  format->encoding_variant = MMAL_ENCODING_I420;
427 
428  format->encoding = MMAL_ENCODING_I420;
429  format->es->video.width = state->width;
430  format->es->video.height = state->height;
431  format->es->video.crop.x = 0;
432  format->es->video.crop.y = 0;
433  format->es->video.crop.width = state->width;
434  format->es->video.crop.height = state->height;
435  format->es->video.frame_rate.num = state->framerate;
436  format->es->video.frame_rate.den = VIDEO_FRAME_RATE_DEN;
437 
438  status = mmal_port_format_commit(video_port);
439 
440  if (status) {
441  vcos_log_error("camera video format couldn't be set");
442  ROS_ERROR("camera video format couldn't be set");
443  goto error;
444  }
445 
446  // Ensure there are enough buffers to avoid dropping frames
447  if (video_port->buffer_num < VIDEO_OUTPUT_BUFFERS_NUM)
448  video_port->buffer_num = VIDEO_OUTPUT_BUFFERS_NUM;
449 
450  // Set the encode format on the still port
451 
452  format = still_port->format;
453 
454  format->encoding = MMAL_ENCODING_OPAQUE;
455  format->encoding_variant = MMAL_ENCODING_I420;
456 
457  format->es->video.width = state->width;
458  format->es->video.height = state->height;
459  format->es->video.crop.x = 0;
460  format->es->video.crop.y = 0;
461  format->es->video.crop.width = state->width;
462  format->es->video.crop.height = state->height;
463  format->es->video.frame_rate.num = 1;
464  format->es->video.frame_rate.den = 1;
465 
466  status = mmal_port_format_commit(still_port);
467 
468  if (status) {
469  vcos_log_error("camera still format couldn't be set");
470  ROS_ERROR("camera still format couldn't be set");
471  goto error;
472  }
473 
474  video_port->buffer_num = video_port->buffer_num_recommended;
475  /* Ensure there are enough buffers to avoid dropping frames */
476  if (still_port->buffer_num < VIDEO_OUTPUT_BUFFERS_NUM)
477  still_port->buffer_num = VIDEO_OUTPUT_BUFFERS_NUM;
478 
479  /* Enable component */
480  status = mmal_component_enable(camera);
481 
482  if (status) {
483  vcos_log_error("camera component couldn't be enabled");
484  ROS_ERROR("camera component couldn't be enabled");
485  goto error;
486  }
487 
488  raspicamcontrol_set_all_parameters(camera, &state->camera_parameters);
489 
490  state->camera_component = camera;
491 
492  ROS_INFO("Camera component done\n");
493 
494  return camera;
495 
496 error:
497 
498  if (camera) mmal_component_destroy(camera);
499 
500  return 0;
501 }
502 
509 static void destroy_camera_component(RASPIVID_STATE *state) {
510  if (state->camera_component) {
511  mmal_component_destroy(state->camera_component);
512  state->camera_component = NULL;
513  }
514 }
515 
524 static MMAL_STATUS_T create_encoder_component(RASPIVID_STATE *state) {
525  MMAL_COMPONENT_T *encoder = 0;
526  MMAL_PORT_T *encoder_input = NULL, *encoder_output = NULL;
527  MMAL_STATUS_T status;
528  MMAL_POOL_T *pool;
529 
530  status =
531  mmal_component_create(MMAL_COMPONENT_DEFAULT_IMAGE_ENCODER, &encoder);
532 
533  if (status != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
534  vcos_log_error("Unable to create video encoder component");
535  ROS_ERROR("Unable to create video encoder component");
536  goto error;
537  }
538 
539  if (!encoder->input_num || !encoder->output_num) {
540  status = MMAL_ENOSYS;
541  vcos_log_error("Video encoder doesn't have input/output ports");
542  ROS_ERROR("Video encoder doesn't have input/output ports");
543  goto error;
544  }
545 
546  encoder_input = encoder->input[0];
547  encoder_output = encoder->output[0];
548 
549  // We want same format on input and output
550  mmal_format_copy(encoder_output->format, encoder_input->format);
551 
552  // Only supporting H264 at the moment
553  encoder_output->format->encoding = MMAL_ENCODING_JPEG;
554 
555  encoder_output->buffer_size = encoder_output->buffer_size_recommended;
556 
557  if (encoder_output->buffer_size < encoder_output->buffer_size_min)
558  encoder_output->buffer_size = encoder_output->buffer_size_min;
559 
560  encoder_output->buffer_num = encoder_output->buffer_num_recommended;
561 
562  if (encoder_output->buffer_num < encoder_output->buffer_num_min)
563  encoder_output->buffer_num = encoder_output->buffer_num_min;
564 
565  // Commit the port changes to the output port
566  status = mmal_port_format_commit(encoder_output);
567 
568  if (status != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
569  vcos_log_error("Unable to set format on video encoder output port");
570  ROS_ERROR("Unable to set format on video encoder output port");
571  goto error;
572  }
573 
574  // Set the JPEG quality level
575  status = mmal_port_parameter_set_uint32(
576  encoder_output, MMAL_PARAMETER_JPEG_Q_FACTOR, state->quality);
577 
578  if (status != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
579  vcos_log_error("Unable to set JPEG quality");
580  ROS_ERROR("Unable to set JPEG quality");
581  goto error;
582  }
583 
584  // Enable component
585  status = mmal_component_enable(encoder);
586 
587  if (status != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
588  vcos_log_error("Unable to enable video encoder component");
589  ROS_ERROR("Unable to enable video encoder component");
590  goto error;
591  }
592 
593  /* Create pool of buffer headers for the output port to consume */
594  pool = mmal_port_pool_create(encoder_output, encoder_output->buffer_num,
595  encoder_output->buffer_size);
596 
597  if (!pool) {
598  vcos_log_error(
599  "Failed to create buffer header pool for encoder output port %s",
600  encoder_output->name);
601  ROS_ERROR(
602  "Failed to create buffer header pool for encoder output port %s",
603  encoder_output->name);
604  }
605 
606  state->encoder_pool = pool;
607  state->encoder_component = encoder;
608 
609  ROS_INFO("Encoder component done\n");
610 
611  return status;
612 
613 error:
614  if (encoder) mmal_component_destroy(encoder);
615 
616  return status;
617 }
618 
625 static void destroy_encoder_component(RASPIVID_STATE *state) {
626  // Get rid of any port buffers first
627  if (state->video_pool) {
628  mmal_port_pool_destroy(state->encoder_component->output[0],
629  state->video_pool);
630  }
631 
632  if (state->encoder_component) {
633  mmal_component_destroy(state->encoder_component);
634  state->encoder_component = NULL;
635  }
636 }
637 
648 static MMAL_STATUS_T connect_ports(MMAL_PORT_T *output_port,
649  MMAL_PORT_T *input_port,
650  MMAL_CONNECTION_T **connection) {
651  MMAL_STATUS_T status;
652 
653  status =
654  mmal_connection_create(connection, output_port, input_port,
655  MMAL_CONNECTION_FLAG_TUNNELLING |
656  MMAL_CONNECTION_FLAG_ALLOCATION_ON_INPUT);
657 
658  if (status == MMAL_SUCCESS) {
659  status = mmal_connection_enable(*connection);
660  if (status != MMAL_SUCCESS) mmal_connection_destroy(*connection);
661  }
662 
663  return status;
664 }
665 
672 static void check_disable_port(MMAL_PORT_T *port) {
673  if (port && port->is_enabled) mmal_port_disable(port);
674 }
675 
682 static void signal_handler(int signal_number) {
683  // Going to abort on all signals
684  vcos_log_error("Aborting program\n");
685  ROS_ERROR("Aborting program\n");
686 
687  // TODO : Need to close any open stuff...how?
688 
689  exit(255);
690 }
691 
696 int init_cam(RASPIVID_STATE *state) {
697  // Our main data storage vessel..
698  MMAL_STATUS_T status;
699  MMAL_PORT_T *camera_video_port = NULL;
700  MMAL_PORT_T *camera_still_port = NULL;
701  MMAL_PORT_T *preview_input_port = NULL;
702  MMAL_PORT_T *encoder_input_port = NULL;
703  MMAL_PORT_T *encoder_output_port = NULL;
704 
705  bcm_host_init();
706  get_status(state);
707  // Register our application with the logging system
708  vcos_log_register("RaspiVid", VCOS_LOG_CATEGORY);
709 
710  signal(SIGINT, signal_handler);
711 
712  // OK, we have a nice set of parameters. Now set up our components
713  // We have three components. Camera, Preview and encoder.
714 
715  if (!create_camera_component(state)) {
716  ROS_INFO("%s: Failed to create camera component", __func__);
717  } else if ((status = create_encoder_component(state)) != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
718  ROS_INFO("%s: Failed to create encode component", __func__);
719  destroy_camera_component(state);
720  } else {
721  PORT_USERDATA *callback_data_enc =
722  (PORT_USERDATA *)malloc(sizeof(PORT_USERDATA));
723  camera_video_port =
724  state->camera_component->output[MMAL_CAMERA_VIDEO_PORT];
725  camera_still_port =
726  state->camera_component->output[MMAL_CAMERA_CAPTURE_PORT];
727  encoder_input_port = state->encoder_component->input[0];
728  encoder_output_port = state->encoder_component->output[0];
729  status = connect_ports(camera_video_port, encoder_input_port,
730  &state->encoder_connection);
731  if (status != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
732  ROS_INFO("%s: Failed to connect camera video port to encoder input",
733  __func__);
734  return 1;
735  }
736  callback_data_enc->buffer[0] = (unsigned char *)malloc(IMG_BUFFER_SIZE);
737  callback_data_enc->buffer[1] = (unsigned char *)malloc(IMG_BUFFER_SIZE);
738  // Set up our userdata - this is passed though to the callback where we
739  // need the information.
740  callback_data_enc->pstate = state;
741  callback_data_enc->abort = 0;
742  callback_data_enc->id = 0;
743  callback_data_enc->frame = 0;
744  encoder_output_port->userdata =
745  (struct MMAL_PORT_USERDATA_T *)callback_data_enc;
746  PORT_USERDATA *pData = (PORT_USERDATA *)encoder_output_port->userdata;
747  // Enable the encoder output port and tell it its callback function
748  status = mmal_port_enable(encoder_output_port, encoder_buffer_callback);
749  if (status != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
750  ROS_INFO("Failed to setup encoder output");
751  return 1;
752  }
753  state->isInit = 1;
754  }
755  return 0;
756 }
757 
758 int start_capture(RASPIVID_STATE *state) {
759  if (!(state->isInit)) init_cam(state);
760  MMAL_PORT_T *camera_video_port =
761  state->camera_component->output[MMAL_CAMERA_VIDEO_PORT];
762  MMAL_PORT_T *encoder_output_port = state->encoder_component->output[0];
763  ROS_INFO("Starting video capture (%d, %d, %d, %d)\n", state->width,
764  state->height, state->quality, state->framerate);
765 
766  if (mmal_port_parameter_set_boolean(
767  camera_video_port, MMAL_PARAMETER_CAPTURE, 1) != MMAL_SUCCESS) {
768  return 1;
769  }
770  // Send all the buffers to the video port
771  {
772  int num = mmal_queue_length(state->encoder_pool->queue);
773  int q;
774  for (q = 0; q < num; q++) {
775  MMAL_BUFFER_HEADER_T *buffer =
776  mmal_queue_get(state->encoder_pool->queue);
777 
778  if (!buffer) {
779  vcos_log_error(
780  "Unable to get a required buffer %d from pool queue", q);
781  ROS_ERROR("Unable to get a required buffer %d from pool queue",
782  q);
783  }
784 
785  if (mmal_port_send_buffer(encoder_output_port, buffer) !=
786  MMAL_SUCCESS) {
787  vcos_log_error(
788  "Unable to send a buffer to encoder output port (%d)", q);
789  ROS_ERROR("Unable to send a buffer to encoder output port (%d)",
790  q);
791  }
792  }
793  }
794  ROS_INFO("Video capture started\n");
795  return 0;
796 }
797 
798 int close_cam(RASPIVID_STATE *state) {
799 
800  //Return to camera 1
801  i2c.send(0x01);
802  gpio.digitalWrite(ePin, 0);
803  gpio.digitalWrite(f1, 0);
804  gpio.digitalWrite(f2, 1);
805 
806  usleep(100000); //delay for a tenth of a second
807 
808  if (state->isInit) {
809  state->isInit = 0;
810  MMAL_COMPONENT_T *camera = state->camera_component;
811  MMAL_COMPONENT_T *encoder = state->encoder_component;
812  MMAL_PORT_T *encoder_output_port = state->encoder_component->output[0];
813  MMAL_PORT_T *camera_still_port =
814  camera->output[MMAL_CAMERA_CAPTURE_PORT];
815  PORT_USERDATA *pData = (PORT_USERDATA *)encoder_output_port->userdata;
816 
817  if (camera_still_port && camera_still_port->is_enabled)
818  mmal_port_disable(camera_still_port);
819 
820  if (encoder->output[0] && encoder->output[0]->is_enabled)
821  mmal_port_disable(encoder->output[0]);
822 
823  mmal_connection_destroy(state->encoder_connection);
824 
825  // Disable components
826  if (encoder) mmal_component_disable(encoder);
827 
828  if (camera) mmal_component_disable(camera);
829 
830  // Destroy encoder component
831  // Get rid of any port buffers first
832  if (state->encoder_pool) {
833  mmal_port_pool_destroy(encoder->output[0], state->encoder_pool);
834  }
835 
836  free(pData->buffer[0]);
837  free(pData->buffer[1]);
838 
839  if (encoder) {
840  mmal_component_destroy(encoder);
841  encoder = NULL;
842  }
843  // destroy camera component
844  if (camera) {
845  mmal_component_destroy(camera);
846  camera = NULL;
847  }
848  ROS_INFO("Video capture stopped\n");
849  return 0;
850  } else
851  return 1;
852 }
853 
854 void reconfigure_callback(raspicam_node::CameraConfig &config, uint32_t level) {
855  ROS_INFO(
856  "Reconfigure Request: contrast %d, sharpness %d, brightness %d, "
857  "saturation %d, ISO %d, exposureCompensation %d,"
858  " videoStabilisation %d, vFlip %d, hFlip %d,"
859  " zoom %.2f, exposure_mode %s, awb_mode %s",
860  config.contrast, config.sharpness, config.brightness, config.saturation,
861  config.ISO, config.exposureCompensation, config.videoStabilisation,
862  config.vFlip, config.hFlip, config.zoom, config.exposure_mode.c_str(),
863  config.awb_mode.c_str());
864 
865  if (!state_srv.camera_component) {
866  ROS_WARN("camera_component not initialized");
867  return;
868  }
869 
870  if (config.zoom < 1.0) {
871  ROS_ERROR("Zoom value %f too small (must be at least 1.0)",
872  config.zoom);
873  } else {
874  const double size = 1.0 / config.zoom;
875  const double offset = (1.0 - size) / 2.0;
876  PARAM_FLOAT_RECT_T roi;
877  roi.x = roi.y = offset;
878  roi.w = roi.h = size;
879  raspicamcontrol_set_ROI(state_srv.camera_component, roi);
880  }
881 
882  raspicamcontrol_set_exposure_mode(
883  state_srv.camera_component,
884  exposure_mode_from_string(config.exposure_mode.c_str()));
885 
886  raspicamcontrol_set_awb_mode(state_srv.camera_component,
887  awb_mode_from_string(config.awb_mode.c_str()));
888 
889  raspicamcontrol_set_contrast(state_srv.camera_component, config.contrast);
890  raspicamcontrol_set_sharpness(state_srv.camera_component, config.sharpness);
891  raspicamcontrol_set_brightness(state_srv.camera_component,
892  config.brightness);
893  raspicamcontrol_set_saturation(state_srv.camera_component,
894  config.saturation);
895  raspicamcontrol_set_ISO(state_srv.camera_component, config.ISO);
896  raspicamcontrol_set_exposure_compensation(state_srv.camera_component,
897  config.exposureCompensation);
898  raspicamcontrol_set_video_stabilisation(state_srv.camera_component,
899  config.videoStabilisation);
900  raspicamcontrol_set_flips(state_srv.camera_component, config.hFlip,
901  config.vFlip);
902  raspicamcontrol_set_shutter_speed(state_srv.camera_component,
903  config.shutterSpeed);
904 
905  ROS_INFO("Reconfigure done");
906 }
907 
908 //Function for switching cameras
909 void updateCameraSelection(const std_msgs::UInt8::ConstPtr& msg){
910  int newCam = msg->data;
911  if(newCam != lastCam){
912  ROS_INFO("Switching to camera %d", msg->data);
913 
914  switch(msg->data){
915  case(1):
916  if(i2c.send(0x01) == -1){return;}
917  gpio.digitalWrite(ePin, 0);
918  gpio.digitalWrite(f1, 0);
919  gpio.digitalWrite(f2, 1);
920  if(gpio.fail()){ROS_DEBUG("GPIO FAILED!");}
921  if(i2c.fail()){ROS_DEBUG("I2C FAILED!");}
922  break;
923  case(2):
924  if(i2c.send(0x02) == -1){return;}
925  gpio.digitalWrite(ePin, 1);
926  gpio.digitalWrite(f1, 0);
927  gpio.digitalWrite(f2, 1);
928  if(gpio.fail()){ROS_DEBUG("GPIO FAILED!");}
929  if(i2c.fail()){ROS_DEBUG("I2C FAILED!");}
930  break;
931  case(3):
932  if(i2c.send(0x04) == -1){return;}
933  gpio.digitalWrite(ePin, 0);
934  gpio.digitalWrite(f1, 1);
935  gpio.digitalWrite(f2, 0);
936  if(gpio.fail()){ROS_DEBUG("GPIO FAILED!");}
937  if(i2c.fail()){ROS_DEBUG("I2C FAILED!");}
938  break;
939  case(4):
940  if(i2c.send(0x08) == -1){return;}
941  gpio.digitalWrite(ePin, 1);
942  gpio.digitalWrite(f1, 1);
943  gpio.digitalWrite(f2, 0);
944  if(gpio.fail()){ROS_DEBUG("GPIO FAILED!");}
945  if(i2c.fail()){ROS_DEBUG("I2C FAILED!");}
946  break;
947  default:
948  ROS_ERROR("Camera %d not valid!", msg->data);
949  return;
950  break;
951  }
952 
953  lastCam = newCam;
954  }
955 }
956 
957 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
958  ros::init(argc, argv, "raspicam_node");
959  ros::NodeHandle n("~");
960  ros::NodeHandle nh; //default nodehandle for camera_select topic
961 
962  //For IVPort video mux
963  camera_select_sub = nh.subscribe("camera_select", 3, updateCameraSelection);
964  gpio.pinMode(ePin, "out");
965  gpio.pinMode(f1, "out");
966  gpio.pinMode(f2, "out");
967 
968  gpio.digitalWrite(ePin, 0);
969  gpio.digitalWrite(f1, 0);
970  gpio.digitalWrite(f2, 1);
971 
972  if(i2c.send(0x01) == -1){return 2;} //set i2c to camera 1
973  if(i2c.fail()){ROS_DEBUG("I2C FAILED!");}
974 
975 
976  usleep(500000); //delay for a 1/2 second
977 
978  //written twice to prevent start up fail problem
979 
980  gpio.pinMode(ePin, "out");
981  gpio.pinMode(f1, "out");
982  gpio.pinMode(f2, "out");
983 
984  gpio.digitalWrite(ePin, 0);
985  gpio.digitalWrite(f1, 0);
986  gpio.digitalWrite(f2, 1);
987 
988  usleep(500000); //delay for a 1/2 second
989 
990  n.param("skip_frames", skip_frames, 0);
991 
992  std::string camera_info_url;
993  std::string camera_name;
994 
995  n.param("camera_info_url", camera_info_url,
996  std::string("package://raspicam_node/camera_info/camera.yaml"));
997  n.param("camera_name", camera_name, std::string("camera"));
998  ROS_INFO("Loading CameraInfo from %s", camera_info_url.c_str());
999 
1000  camera_info_manager::CameraInfoManager c_info_man(n, camera_name,
1001  camera_info_url);
1002  // get_status(&state_srv);
1003  init_cam(&state_srv); // will need to figure out how to handle start and
1004  // stop with dynamic reconfigure
1005 
1006  if (!c_info_man.loadCameraInfo(camera_info_url)) {
1007  ROS_INFO("Calibration file missing. Camera not calibrated");
1008  } else {
1009  c_info = c_info_man.getCameraInfo();
1010  ROS_INFO("Camera successfully calibrated");
1011  }
1012 
1013  image_pub =
1014  n.advertise<sensor_msgs::CompressedImage>("image/compressed", 1);
1015  camera_info_pub = n.advertise<sensor_msgs::CameraInfo>("camera_info", 1);
1016 
1017  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<raspicam_node::CameraConfig> server;
1018  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<raspicam_node::CameraConfig>::CallbackType f;
1019  f = boost::bind(&reconfigure_callback, _1, _2);
1020  server.setCallback(f);
1021 
1022  start_capture(&state_srv);
1023  ros::spin();
1024  close_cam(&state_srv);
1025  return 0;
1026 }
